short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search the CSN Library's Catalog at any moment without leaving your current page!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Instantly search the CSN Libraries catalog in Chrome! If you’re doing research for an assignment at the College of Southern Nevada and want to quickly see if we have print or online materials on the subject, simply highlight the words you want to search, right click (Control+click on a Mac), and select “Search in the CSN Library’s Catalog.” This Chrome extension will then bring up library search results that you have access to as a CSN student or employee. You can also search Google Scholar or our InterLibrary Loan network WorldCat with a right click as well.


This extension was created using the code provided by the Leiden University Libraries
